ghost-of-tsushima.title: Ghost of Tsushima DIRECTOR'S CUT
ghost-of-tsushima.description: Ghost of Tsushima is an open-world action-adventure set in feudal Japan that follows Jin Sakai as he defends Tsushima Island from Mongol invaders. The Director's Cut includes the Iki Island expansion and enhanced PC features.
ghost-of-tsushima.about: Venture into the complete Ghost of Tsushima DIRECTOR'S CUT on PC; forge your own path through this open-world action-adventure and uncover its hidden wonders. Developed by Sucker Punch Productions and brought to PC by Nixxes Software.

minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT

gta-6.title: Grand Theft Auto VI
gta-6.description: The next entry in Rockstar’s legendary open-world action series, set in a dynamic, evolving world of crime and freedom.
gta-6.about: Grand Theft Auto VI is an upcoming action-adventure game developed and published by Rockstar Games. It is due to be the eighth main Grand Theft Auto game, following Grand Theft Auto V, and the sixteenth entry overall.

ghost-of-yotei.title: Ghost of Yōtei
ghost-of-yotei.description: A standalone samurai revenge adventure set in 1603 rural Japan, where a lone mercenary hunts those who killed her family.
ghost-of-yotei.about: Ghost of Yōtei is an action-adventure game developed by Sucker Punch Productions for PS5, set around Mount Yōtei in 1603.

minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Super / AMD RX 5600 XT

hollow-knight-silksong.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong
hollow-knight-silksong.description: A fast, fluid, needle-sharp Metroidvania following Hornet as she ascends through a mysterious haunted kingdom.
hollow-knight-silksong.about: Hollow Knight: Silksong is an upcoming action-platformer developed by Team Cherry. The game follows Hornet, princess-protector of Hallownest, as she's taken to the kingdom of Pharloom and fights her way to the top of the shimmering citadel.

nier-automata.title: NieR: Automata
nier-automata.description: A fast-paced action RPG where androids battle machines in a desolate future Earth.
nier-automata.about: NieR: Automata is an action RPG developed by PlatinumGames and published by Square Enix. Set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by machine lifeforms, players follow android units 2B, 9S, and A2 in a story blending combat, philosophy, and emotional depth.

cyberpunk-2077.title: Cyberpunk 2077
cyberpunk-2077.description: A futuristic open-world RPG set in the neon-soaked streets of Night City.
cyberpunk-2077.about: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world action RPG developed by CD Projekt Red. You play as V, a mercenary navigating high-tech body mods, gang wars, and corporate power struggles in a massive dystopian city.

age_rating.description: Violence, Strong Language, Sexual Content, Drugs

avatar-frontiers-of-pandora.title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora
avatar-frontiers-of-pandora.description: A first-person open-world adventure set on Pandora where you fight to protect the Na'vi homeland.
avatar-frontiers-of-pandora.about: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora is an open-world action-adventure game developed by Massive Entertainment and published by Ubisoft. You play as a Na'vi raised by the RDA, returning to your roots to explore the Western Frontier of Pandora.

gta-trilogy-definitive-edition.title: Grand Theft Auto: The Trilogy – Definitive Edition
gta-trilogy-definitive-edition.description: Remastered versions of GTA III, GTA Vice City, and GTA San Andreas with upgraded visuals and modern controls.
gta-trilogy-definitive-edition.about: GTA Trilogy – Definitive Edition bundles three classics: Grand Theft Auto III, Grand Theft Auto: Vice City, and Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas. Developed by Grove Street Games and published by Rockstar Games, it features enhanced lighting, textures, controls, and gameplay improvements for modern systems.

elden-ring.title: Elden Ring
elden-ring.description: A vast dark-fantasy open world where you rise as the Tarnished to claim the Elden Ring.
elden-ring.about: Elden Ring is an open-world action RPG developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco. Created with story contributions from George R. R. Martin, it features massive exploration, brutal combat, and deep lore.

rdr2.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
rdr2.description: An epic western open-world adventure from Rockstar Games.
rdr2.about: Red Dead Redemption 2 is an action-adventure game developed and published by Rockstar Games, following Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang in 1899 America.

witcher-3.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
witcher-3.description: A massive fantasy RPG following Geralt of Rivia.
witcher-3.about: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is an open-world RPG developed by CD Projekt Red. You play as Geralt, a monster hunter searching for Ciri.

minimum.cpu: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD Phenom II X4 940

halo-infinite.title: Halo Infinite
halo-infinite.description: Master Chief returns in an open-world Halo adventure.
halo-infinite.about: Halo Infinite is a sci-fi FPS developed by 343 Industries and published by Xbox Game Studios.

forza-horizon-5.title: Forza Horizon 5
forza-horizon-5.description: A massive open-world racing adventure set in Mexico.
forza-horizon-5.about: Forza Horizon 5 is an open-world racing game developed by Playground Games and published by Xbox Game Studios.

resident-evil-4-remake.title: Resident Evil 4 Remake
resident-evil-4-remake.about: Resident Evil 4 Remake is a survival-horror game developed and published by Capcom, retelling Leon Kennedy’s rescue mission with modern visuals.

diablo-iv.title: Diablo IV
diablo-iv.description: A dark, open-world action RPG where humanity battles the return of Lilith.
diablo-iv.about: Diablo IV is an action RPG developed and published by Blizzard Entertainment. It features an open world, class-based combat, dungeons, PvP zones, and the return of Lilith as the main antagonist.

hogwarts-legacy.title: Hogwarts Legacy
hogwarts-legacy.description: A magical open-world RPG set in the 1800s wizarding world.
hogwarts-legacy.about: Hogwarts Legacy is an open-world action RPG developed by Avalanche Software and published by Warner Bros. Games, letting players live as a student at Hogwarts.

baldurs-gate-3.title: Baldur's Gate 3
baldurs-gate-3.description: A cinematic story-driven RPG set in the Dungeons & Dragons universe.
baldurs-gate-3.about: Baldur's Gate 3 is an RPG developed and published by Larian Studios, featuring deep choices, tactical combat, and branching narratives.

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA RTX 2060 Super / AMD RX 5700 XT

fortnite.title: Fortnite
fortnite.description: A massive battle royale and creative sandbox game.
fortnite.about: Fortnite is an online multiplayer shooter developed by Epic Games featuring battle royale, creative mode, and events.

genshin-impact.title: Genshin Impact
genshin-impact.description: An anime-style open-world action RPG with elemental combat.
genshin-impact.about: Genshin Impact is an open-world action RPG developed by miHoYo, featuring a huge world, characters, and elemental combos.

apex-legends.title: Apex Legends
apex-legends.about: Apex Legends is a free-to-play hero shooter developed by Respawn Entertainment and published by EA.

league-of-legends.title: League of Legends
league-of-legends.description: A competitive 5v5 MOBA played by millions.
league-of-legends.about: League of Legends is a multiplayer online battle arena game developed and published by Riot Games.

valheim.title: Valheim
valheim.description: A brutal Viking survival game set in a procedurally generated purgatory.
valheim.about: Valheim is a survival and exploration game developed by Iron Gate Studio. You awaken in a vast Norse world where you must craft, build, battle bosses, and survive the wilderness.

minimum.cpu: Intel Core i5-750 / AMD Athlon X4 740

starfield.title: Starfield
starfield.description: A next-gen space RPG from Bethesda.
starfield.about: Starfield is an open-universe RPG developed by Bethesda Game Studios, letting players explore star systems, build ships, and uncover mysteries of the cosmos.

monster-hunter-wild.title: Monster Hunter Wilds
monster-hunter-wild.description: The next generation of Monster Hunter with dynamic ecosystems.
monster-hunter-wild.about: Monster Hunter Wilds is an upcoming action RPG by Capcom, evolving the series with seamless environments and improved monster behavior.

witcher-4.title: The Witcher 4
witcher-4.about: The Witcher 4 (officially 'Project Polaris') is the next Witcher saga developed by CD Projekt Red using Unreal Engine 5.

death-stranding.title: Death Stranding
death-stranding.description: A mysterious open-world adventure by Hideo Kojima.
death-stranding.about: Death Stranding is an action game developed by Kojima Productions featuring Sam Bridges reconnecting isolated cities in a fractured America.

minecraft.title: Minecraft
minecraft.description: A sandbox world of infinite creativity.
minecraft.about: Minecraft is a survival sandbox game developed by Mojang Studios, featuring exploration, crafting, and building.

roblox.title: Roblox
roblox.description: A massive platform of user-created games.
roblox.about: Roblox is an online game platform and creation system developed by Roblox Corporation.

doom-eternal.title: DOOM Eternal
doom-eternal.description: A brutal, fast-paced demon-slaying FPS set across Earth and Hell.
doom-eternal.about: DOOM Eternal is a first-person shooter developed by id Software and published by Bethesda Softworks, continuing the Slayer’s war against Hell’s armies.

stalker-2.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl
stalker-2.description: Discover the vast Chornobyl Exclusion Zone full of dangerous enemies, deadly anomalies and powerful artifacts.
stalker-2.about: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl is a next-gen sequel to the award-winning franchise, developed by GSC Game World. Experience a unique blend of FPS, immersive sim, and horror.

minimum.gpu: AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB

recommended.gpu: AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT / NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 SUPER

call-of-duty-black-ops-6.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6
call-of-duty-black-ops-6.description: Signature Black Ops across a cinematic single-player Campaign, a best-in-class Multiplayer experience and the epic return of Round-Based Zombies.
call-of-duty-black-ops-6.about: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 is a spy action thriller developed by Treyarch and Raven Software. Set in the early 90s, a period of transition and upheaval in global politics.

minimum.gpu: AMD Radeon RX 470 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960

recommended.gpu: AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 Ti

dragon-age-the-veilguard.title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard
dragon-age-the-veilguard.description: Enter the world of Thedas, a vibrant land of rugged wilderness, treacherous labyrinths, and glittering cities.
dragon-age-the-veilguard.about: Dragon Age: The Veilguard is an immersive single-player RPG where you become the leader others believe in. Unite the Veilguard and defy the gods.

space-marine-2.title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2
space-marine-2.description: Embody the superhuman skill and brutality of a Space Marine, the greatest of the Emperor's warriors.
space-marine-2.about: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 is a third-person shooter hack-n-slash game. Hold at bay the horrors of the galaxy in epic battles on far-flung planets.

minimum.gpu: AMD Radeon RX 580 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060

recommended.gpu: AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT / NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070

black-myth-wukong.title: Black Myth: Wukong
black-myth-wukong.description: An action RPG rooted in Chinese mythology. You shall set out as the Destined One to venture into the challenges and marvels ahead.
black-myth-wukong.about: Black Myth: Wukong is an action RPG developed by Game Science, based on the classic Chinese novel Journey to the West. It features stunning visuals and fast-paced combat.

minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT

helldivers-2.title: Helldivers 2
helldivers-2.description: The Galaxy's Last Line of Offence. Enlist in the Helldivers and join the fight for freedom across a hostile galaxy.
helldivers-2.about: Helldivers 2 is a 3rd person squad-based shooter developed by Arrowhead Game Studios. Join forces with up to 4 friends and wreak havoc on an alien scourge threatening the safety of Super Earth.

minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT
